author: Albert S. Crockett
description: Bone dry and aromatic with green grape, citrus and mineral notes. Also consider garnishing this cocktail with an olive â€“ it suits it. This is a tasty riff on a Dry Martini but it has no vermouth (it uses sherry instead) so isn't really a Dry Martini or even a Tuxedo.
name: Tuxedo No.4 or Tussetto

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
